detailed_results.test_description: CEO access in dev mode - should work (auto-auth as CEO)
No date params - should default to last 7 days

response.detail: from must be a valid date string
to must be a valid date string

detailed_results.test_description: Default pagination - should return page=1, pageSize=50
Empty search - should return all results
Verify response has correct structure: items, page, pageSize, total, totalPages
Combined date range + domain + userId filters
Negative page number - should default to 1
Zero pageSize - should default to minimum
Very long search term - should handle gracefully
